# Interface TTSNodeFactoryInterface

Interface for TTS node factory parameters.

interface TTSNodeFactoryInterface {  
executionConfig?: [TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
ttsConfig: [RemoteTTSConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.RemoteTTSConfigInterface) | [LocalTTSConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.LocalTTSConfigInterface);  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/nodes/node_factory.TTSNodeFactoryInterface))

### `Optional`executionConfig

executionConfig?: [TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface)

Execution configuration for the TTS node

### id

id: string

Unique identifier for the node

Inherited from [NodeFactoryInterface](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface).[id](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface#id)

### ttsConfig

ttsConfig: [RemoteTTSConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.RemoteTTSConfigInterface) | [LocalTTSConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.LocalTTSConfigInterface)

Configuration for the text-to-speech service (local or remote)
